column5: Would anyone be kind enough to recommend a motel for 1 night in Sioux Lookout? Thanks in advance.
^^THIS^^ plus they have a good breakfast. Pooch
I've stayed at Lamplighter and Forest Inn. Forest Inn also has a decent restaurant.
Always the Lamplighter for me. PjShorthorn
We are staying at the Sioux Lookout inn & suites in a couple weeks
I stayed at Lamps a few years ago. Clean and a great breakfast.
Wellington Inn. Good meals as well.
